---
title: "new data features"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
unemployment <- read.csv("Data/unemployment.csv")

unemployment1 <- unemployment %>%
  select (Country.Code , Country.Name, X2006:X2018) %>%
  gather("Year","Unemployment",3:15) %>%
  arrange(desc(Year)) %>%
  arrange(Country.Name)  %>%
  mutate(Year, Year = str_replace(Year, "X", "")) %>%
  select(Country = Country.Name, Code = Country.Code, Year,Unemployment)

unemployment1 <- unemployment1 %>%
  filter(Country %in% countries$V1 )  %>%
  arrange(desc(Year)) %>%
  arrange(Country) 
```
